TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransformPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 代表可在二維空間內移動、調整大小或旋轉的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控制項模式的支援不限於桌面上的物件。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 也必須將此控制項模式支援容器物件的子系，只要子系可以移動、 調整大小或旋轉自由地在容器的界限內。This control pattern must also be supported by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

related.span: UI 自動化控制項模式概觀

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 用戶端的 UI 自動化控制項模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMoveProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞至函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]子系的根，並滿足一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須介於與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果已取得使用、 它只快取的資料，包含並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用來取得快取先前使用指定的屬性值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);

param.name: x
param.span: 控制項左側的絕對螢幕座標。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: 控制項上方的絕對螢幕座標。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自後續會用來移動和。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這類模式識別項傳遞給方法來擷取從指定的控制項模式感興趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);

param.name: width
param.span: 視窗的新寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 視窗的新高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項上呼叫支援分割窗格時，這個方法可以有副作用的調整大小的其他連續的窗格。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自後續會用來調整大小和。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed

param.name: degrees

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the element.

param.span: 正數會順時針旋轉，負數會逆時針旋轉。

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使其產生的畫面位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法存取以鍵盤或滑鼠。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 比方說，當最上層的視窗完全出螢幕外移，或子物件是容器的檢視區界限之外移動。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置在接近所要求的螢幕座標被覆寫成容器範圍內的上方或左方座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自和後續會用來旋轉。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to rotate the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
